dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, settlements, places of historical interest (numbered).
Features illustrations of men in foreground.
Appears in Bruyn's Reizen ... door Klein Asia ... van Aegypten, Syrien en Palestina. Delft, Henrik van Krooneveld, 1698.
